description: You've got enough frosting to fill the layers and cover the sides and top of the cake, but Dorie Greenspan covers each layer generously, so generously that when the next layer goes on the frosting ripples out around the edges Then just swirl the frosting over the top, leaving the sides bare.
title: Dorie Greenspan’s Carrot Cake
title_page: Dorie Greenspan’s Carrot Cake Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
You've got enough frosting to fill the layers and cover the sides and top of the cake, but Dorie Greenspan covers each layer generously, so generously that when the next layer goes on the frosting ripples out around the edges. Then just swirl the frosting over the top, leaving the sides bare.
Featured in: The Baker's Apprentice: Carrot Cake.
